title: Lost a skin shard, completely dissapeared
body: I had an Alien Invader Heimerdinger as a skin shard lying around in loot. Logged in today (winter things arrived), he was gone. No dust refund, nothing. Can someone tell me what happened? I know no one has access to this account and no one could do anything. help pls

replies.body: That sounds pretty weird. I checked up on this and it looks like that shard was disenchanted for 364 Orange Essence very recently. If you weren't the one who did that your account might be compromised! Be sure to reach out to our account recovery team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if that's the case!
